import React from 'react'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Thumbs, Navigation, Controller, Lazy } from 'swiper'; function Slider({ product }) { const [thumbs, setThumbs] = React.useState(null); let params = { modules: [Controller, Navigation, Lazy], preloadImages: false, lazy: true, navigation: { nextEl: '.slider-product-controls__arrows .slider-arrow__next', prevEl: '.slider-product-controls__arrows .slider-arrow__prev', }, loop: false, spaceBetween: 30, // getSwiper: updateSwiper, // Get swiper instance callback }; return (
{/*
*/}

{product.name}

{product.price} MDL

{product.description}

{/* */}
); } export default Slider;
